Description: Stunning Penthouse One Bed Duplex!! Incredible find in the heart of Oak Square! Recently remodeled and ready for your 8/15 or 9/1 move. This unit features a private roof top deck, 2 floors, brand new windows, kitchen, and bath, all with heat and hot water included in the rent!! Building itself has an elevator, secure entry, package room, and CARD operated laundry!!
